thread.title: Ronaldo Finally Hits the Target Samsonite

author: Jacky Wong
title: Ronaldo Finally Hits the Target Samsonite
text: What should a brand ambassador for suitcases do? Not appear on a short seller’s report about the company that makes the cases, at the very least. Unfortunately for Portuguese soccer star , that’s exactly the predicament he found himself in this week. In a report on Hong Kong-listed published Thursday, short seller Blue Orca pointed WSJ City PM: Firms Set for Europe's 'Mammoth' Privacy Law, Why Deutsche Bank Needs Radical Ideas Next U.S. Steel Prices on Knife's Edge as Tariff Deadline Nears
